title: New: Grace Lightman – Vapour Trails
content:
This might be the most beautiful debut of the year, courtesy of London’s Grace Lightman (formerly of psych-rock outfit The Hypnotic Eye).

Vapour Trails is a lush ballad, heart-wrenchingly honest and painstakingly perfect in production and vocal delivery; in truth, my feeble words struggle to do justice to the allure of this track. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
